newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products mainly firmer, focus on gas oil.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products mainly firmer, focus on gas oil.

text.p: NWE oil products were generally firmer, gas oil dominating the markets, traders said.
Naphtha prices edged higher on the back of firmer crude but discussion was very thin with buyers relaxed.
Gasoline prices were mixed, barges firmed amid tight Rotterdam supply, European cargoes eased on slack demand and arbitrage cargoes fob U.K. steadied on afternoon NYMEX gains.
Prompt heating oil prices were firmly ensconced above $220 a tonne with concerns over tight supply inflating premiums.
High sulphur fuel oil was firm. A cargo traded at a hefty $109 fob ARA while a low sulphur cargo traded at $106 fob ARA.
